1.0.0.en: Added support for the devices Zappi, Eddi and Harvi

1.0.1.en: Minor improvements and added Norwegian readme.

1.1.4.en: Added Dutch translation (Thanks to Spijkmans). Included accumulated power consumption for all Zappi CTs with type Internal Load. Also included a setting for displaying negative values or not.

1.2.0.en: Added frequency and settings for customizing charging power calculation for Zappi.

1.3.0.en: Added total energy consumption (power meter) to Zappi

1.4.0.en: Added more human readable variables and tags (#13). Added THEN cards to support charge mode and boost mode (#17). Added slider to manually set min. green level. Reordered the sensor page and some bug fixes.

1.4.2.en: Improved pairing logic for Harvi and Eddi devices
